content.question: The repetition of “Vainly” in the third stanza serves primarily to emphasize the extent to which the

choices.label: lady’s discouragement fails to affect her suitors
lady refuses to maintain an aloof perspective
suitors’ heartfelt pleas fail to move the lady
speaker succumbs to the lady’s desire to be admired

content.answer: lady’s discouragement fails to affect her suitors

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
